data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to compare the effects of standard versus experimental treatment on the development and/or progression of diabetic retinopathy. The retinal health status (e.g. presence/absence of macular edema, microaneurysms, neovascularization, hemorrhages) was monitored through seven-field stereoscopic fundus photographs which were taken bi-annually and graded using the ETDRS scale (for published results see: <a href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/7826293?ordinalpos=2&itool=EntrezSystem2.PEntrez.Pubmed.Pubmed_ResultsPanel.Pubmed_DefaultReportPanel.Pubmed_RVDocSum"> PMID 7826293</a>).

variable.name: GROUP
variable.description: Treatment group (experimental, standard)

variable.name: RETBASE
variable.description: Baseline retinopathy stratum (prim, sec)

variable.name: PHASE
variable.description: Randomization phase (2, 3)

variable.name: AGE
variable.description: Patient's age (years) at baseline

variable.name: ADULT
variable.description: Patient is adult (age>=18 yrs) at baseline (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: FEMALE
variable.description: Patient is female

variable.name: DURATION
variable.description: IDDM duration (months) at baseline

variable.name: DUR5
variable.description: IDDM duration >= 5 years at baseline (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: PPDUR
variable.description: Post-pubescent IDDM duration at baseline (months)

variable.name: PPDUR5
variable.description: Post-pubescent IDDM duration at baseline is >=5 yrs at baseline (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: SMOKES
variable.description: Smoking status (1=never, 2=ever, 3=current )

variable.name: RETPAT
variable.description: Level of retinopathy (Grade 1 - 4)

variable.name: PUREPRIM
variable.description: Free of retinopathy at baseline (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: QHBAEL
variable.description: Quartiles: HbA1c at eligibility

variable.name: HBAEL
variable.description: Hemoglobin A1c (%) at baseline

variable.name: HBADF
variable.description: HbA1c: algebraic difference between eligibility and baseline testing

variable.name: MBP
variable.description: Mean arterial pressure

variable.name: CHOL
variable.description: Cholesterol (mg/dl) at baseline

variable.name: TRG
variable.description: Triglycerides (serum, mg/dl, form 023c)

variable.name: HDL
variable.description: HDL cholesterol (serum, mg/dl, form 023c)

variable.name: LDL
variable.description: LDL cholesterol (serum, mg/dl, form 023c)

variable.name: PIDW
variable.description: Percent ideal body weight (obweight/iw) x 100

variable.name: BMI
variable.description: Body mass index (kg/m²)

variable.name: INSULIN
variable.description: Total insulin dosage (units/weight in kg)

variable.name: PIDW120
variable.description: Percent of ideal body weight is >=120 at baseline (0=no/1=yes)

variable.name: NEUR
variable.description: Clinical neuropathy present (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: DBP
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure (mmhg, form 002)

variable.name: SBP
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure (mmhg, form 002)

variable.name: QCHOL
variable.description: Quartiles: cholesterol values - baseline

variable.name: QHDL
variable.description: Quartiles: HDL - cholesterol values - baseline

variable.name: QLDL
variable.description: Quartiles: LDL - cholesterol values - baseline

variable.name: QTRG
variable.description: Quartiles: triglyceride values - baseline

variable.name: AERCAT
variable.description: AER in 4 levels

variable.name: HYPF0
variable.description: Hyperfiltration (standard clearance >/=130) at baseline (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: CLR0
variable.description: Standard clearance (ml/mn/1.73m²) at baseline

variable.name: LASTVIS
variable.description: Most recent quarterly visit (if > 00/baseline)

variable.name: ETDPATB
variable.description: Retinopathy level at baseline (ETDRS levels, >8=8; U=ungradable)

variable.name: STEP300
variable.description: Occurrence of 3-step change in ETDRS level compared to baseline - baseline

variable.name: STEP302
variable.description: Occurrence of 3-step change in ETDRS level compared to baseline - quarterly visit 02

variable.description: Occurrence of 3-step change in ETDRS level compared to baseline - quarterly visit 04

variable.description: Occurrence of 3-step change in ETDRS level compared to baseline - quarterly visit 36

variable.name: HBA00
variable.description: HbA1c (at baseline)

variable.name: STP3OFLG
variable.description: 3-step change occurred (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: STP3PFLG
variable.description: Persistent 3-step change occurred (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: L8S3PFLG
variable.description: Persistent 3-step change at or after 24 months flag

variable.name: L6THRFLG
variable.description: DCCT threshold - ETDRS measured at level 55 or above - (18 months flag)

variable.name: RET50FLG
variable.description: DCCT retinopathy level 50/<50 (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: ETD53FLG
variable.description: Severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy (npdr; ETDRS 53/<53) (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: ET53PFLG
variable.description: Persistent severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy (snpdr; ETDRS 53/<53) (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: ETD61FLG
variable.description: ETDRS level 61/<61 (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: LASSFLG
variable.description: Scatter laser surgery performed on either eye (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: LASFFLG
variable.description: Focal laser surgery performed on either eye (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: CSMEFLG
variable.description: Clinically significant macular edema (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: EDELGFLG
variable.description: Macular edema (ETDRS at entry) (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: RETI3FLG
variable.description: Occurrence of 3-step improvement compared to baseline (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: MA1FLG
variable.description: More than/equal to 1 microaneurysm(s) observed (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: MA1PFLG
variable.description: Persistent >=1 microaneurysm(s) observed ( 0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: MA3FLG
variable.description: More than/equal to 3 microaneurysms observed (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: MA3PFLG
variable.description: Persistent >=3 microaneurysms observed (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: REM1PFLG
variable.description: Recovery from persistent >=1 microaneurysms (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: REM3PFLG
variable.description: Recovery from >= 3 microaneurysms (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: RES3OFLG
variable.description: Recovery from 3-step change in ETDRS (interim scale; 0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: RES3PFLG
variable.description: Recovery from persistent 3-step change in ETDRS (interim scale; 0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: REE3OFLG
variable.description: Recovery from 3-step change in ETDRS (final scale)

variable.name: REE3PFLG
variable.description: Recovery from persistent 3-step change in ETDRS (final scale)

variable.name: REE53FLG
variable.description: Recovery from severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy (snpdr; 53/<53)

variable.name: RE53PFLG
variable.description: Recovery from persistent severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy (snpdr; 53/<53)

variable.name: EY4S3FLG
variable.description: 3-step change (ETDRS) in first 12 months - relative to baseline level (interim scale)

variable.name: EY4SPFLG
variable.description: Persistent 3-step change (ETDRS) in first 12 months - relative to baseline level (final scale)

variable.name: EY4E3FLG
variable.description: 3-step change in first 12 months (ETDRS) - relative to baseline level (final scale)

variable.name: REYS3FLG
variable.description: Recovery from early 3-step change (ETDRS) - relative to baseline level

variable.name: REYSPFLG
variable.description: Recovery from early sustained 3-step change (ETDRS) - relative to baseline level

variable.name: S3O6FLG
variable.description: 3-step change from 18 months (ETDRS - interim scale)

variable.name: S3P6FLG
variable.description: Persistent 3-step change from 18 months (ETDRS - interim scale)

variable.name: E3O6FLG
variable.description: 3-step change from 18 months (ETDRS - final scale)

variable.name: E3P6FLG
variable.description: Persistent 3-step change from 18 months (ETDRS - final scale)

variable.name: EYSEP4F
variable.description: Soft exudate (se) and/or intra-retinal microvascular abnormalities (irma) in first 12 months

variable.name: REYSEFLG
variable.description: Recovery from soft exudate (se) and/or intraretinal microvascular abnormalities (irma)

variable.name: REYE3FLG
variable.description: Recovery from early 3-step change (ETDRS - final scale)

variable.name: ETD3OFLG
variable.description: 3-step change (ETDRS - final scale; 0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: ETD3PFLG
variable.description: Persistent 3-step change (ETDRS - final scale; 0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: NVDFLG
variable.description: New vessels on disc (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: NVEFLG
variable.description: New vessels elsewhere (0=no, 1=yes)

variable.name: NVBFLG
variable.description: New vessels on disc and elsewhere

variable.name: NEOVFLG
variable.description: New vessels on disc or elsewhere

variable.name: VISACFLG
variable.description: Decline in visual acuity (0/1)

variable.name: STP3OVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of first 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: STP3PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of persistent 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: L8S3PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of persistent 3-step change at or after 24 months (ETDRS)

variable.name: RET50VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of DCCT level 50/<50

variable.name: ETD53VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy (npdr; ETDRS 53/<53)

variable.name: ET53PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of persistent severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy (snpdr; ETDRS 53/<53)

variable.name: ETD61VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of ETDRS level 61/<61

variable.name: LASSVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of scatter laser surgery in either eye

variable.name: LASFVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of focal laser surgery in either eye

variable.name: CSMEVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of clinically significant macular edema (csme)

variable.name: EDELGVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of macular edema (ETDRS entry definition)

variable.name: RETI3VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of 3-step improvement from baseline

variable.name: MA1VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of >=1 microaneurysm(s)

variable.name: MA1PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of persistent >=1 microaneurysm(s)

variable.name: MA3VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of >=3 microaneurysms

variable.name: MA3PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of persistent >=3 microaneurysms

variable.name: REM1PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from persistent >= 1microaneurysm(s)

variable.name: REM3PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from persistent >= 3 microaneurysm(s)

variable.name: RES3OVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: RES3PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from sustained 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: REE3OVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: REE3PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from persistent 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: REE53VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy (snpdr; 53/<53)

variable.name: RE53PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from persistent severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy (snpdr; 53/<53)

variable.name: EY4S3VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of 3-step change in first 12 months (interim scale)

variable.name: EY4SPVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of persistent 3-step change in first 12 months (final scale)

variable.name: EY4E3VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of 3-step change in first 12 months (ETDRS)

variable.name: REYS3VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from early 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: REYSPVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from early sustained 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: S3O6VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of 3-step change from 18 months (interim scale)

variable.name: S3P6VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of persistent 3-step change from 18 months (final scale)

variable.name: E3O6VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of 3-step change from 18 months (ETDRS)

variable.name: E3P6VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of persistent 3-step change from 18 months (ETDRS)

variable.name: EYSEP4V
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of soft exudate (se) and/or intra-retinal microvascular abnormalities (irma) in first 12 months

variable.name: REYSEVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from soft exudate (se) and/or intra-retinal microvascular abnormalities (irma)

variable.name: REYE3VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of recovery from early 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: ETD3OVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: ETD3PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of persistent 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: NVDVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of occurrence of new vessels on disc

variable.name: NVEVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of occurrence of new vessels elsewhere (than disc)

variable.name: NVBVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of occurrence of new vessels on disc and elsewhere

variable.name: NEOVVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of occurrence of new vessels on disc or elsewhere

variable.name: VISACVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit number of occurrence of decline in visual acuity

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Masked patient ID
